alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of London, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, London, Jefferson, West Jefferson, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Bloomingburg, Lake Darby, Commercial Point, Lafayette, Midway, Harrisburg, Orient, Darbyville, Newport, Deer Creek Lake, Chenoweth and Interstate 71 at State Route 38. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 76 and 87. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 74 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
